Method Detail

deleteDir

public static boolean deleteDir(File dir)
Deletes all files and subdirectories under dir. Returns true if all deletions were successful. If a deletion fails, the method stops attempting to delete and returns false.

cleanBody

public static String cleanBody(String text)
Cleaninig of the body of text prior to term extraction. Try to remove the pdf extraction garbage and the citation marks.

public static String uploadFile(String urlmsg,
                                String path,
                                String name)

Special cleaning for ZFN extracted data in a BiblioItem

getOsNameAndArch

public static String getOsNameAndArch()
Return the name of directory to use given the os and the architecture.
Possibles returned values should match one of the following:
win-32
lin-32
lin-64
mac-64

Returns:
name of the directory corresponding to the os name and architecture.

stringToBoolean

public static boolean stringToBoolean(String value)
Convert a string to boolean.

Parameters:
value - the value to convert
Returns:
true if the string value is "true", false is it equals to "false".
If the value does not correspond to one of these 2 values, return false.
